Package eu.greenlightning.hypercubepdf.text

Elements which can paint text.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HCPMultilineText
    A text element which handles line breaks.
    HCPNormalText
    A simple text element, which paints a single line of text.
    HCPSideText
    A text element which paints a single line of text rotated by 90Â° counterclockwise.
    HCPStyle
    A style for text consisting of the font, size and color to use when painting the text.
    HCPText
    Base class for text elements.
